title: How to Edit and Present a Prezi Offline

steps.headline: Go to the Prezi desktop page and click the “Install Now” button to download the Prezi desktop software.
steps.description: Note: The Prezi Desktop software is only available to users with a Prezi Pro or Edu Pro license.

steps.headline: Double-click the downloaded file and follow the onscreen instructions to install the software in Adobe Air.
Activate the Prezi Desktop software by signing in with the email and password associated with your account.
Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.
Click the Prezi presentation you want to edit offline using Prezi Desktop.
Click the “Download” button from the tool bar on the right side of the Prezi.
Select the “Download for Prezi Desktop” option and click the “Download” button.
Click the “click this link to download” link to download your Prezi as a “.pez” file.
Click the “File” menu followed by “Open” from the context menu in Prezi Desktop.
Select the downloaded “.pez” file and double-click it to open it.
steps.description: You can now edit and present your Prezi presentation offline using the Prezi Desktop software.

tyn: Adobe Flash Player 9 or higher installed
Internet Explorer 7 or higher, Firefox 3.0 or higher, or Safari 3 or higher
text: Go to the Prezi desktop page and click the “Install Now” button to download the Prezi desktop software. Note: The Prezi Desktop software is only available to users with a Prezi Pro or Edu Pro license. Double-click the downloaded file and follow the onscreen instructions to install the software in Adobe Air.  Activate the Prezi Desktop software by signing in with the email and password associated with your account.  Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.  Click the Prezi presentation you want to edit offline using Prezi Desktop.  Click the “Download” button from the tool bar on the right side of the Prezi.  Select the “Download for Prezi Desktop” option and click the “Download” button.  Click the “click this link to download” link to download your Prezi as a “.pez” file.  Click the “File” menu followed by “Open” from the context menu in Prezi Desktop.  Select the downloaded “.pez” file and double-click it to open it. You can now edit and present your Prezi presentation offline using the Prezi Desktop software.
sentences: Go to the Prezi desktop page and click the “Install Now” button to download the Prezi desktop software.
Note: The Prezi Desktop software is only available to users with a Prezi Pro or Edu Pro license.
Double-click the downloaded file and follow the onscreen instructions to install the software in Adobe Air.
Activate the Prezi Desktop software by signing in with the email and password associated with your account.
Go to the Prezi your prezis page and log in using the email and password associated with your Prezi.com account.
Click the Prezi presentation you want to edit offline using Prezi Desktop.
Click the “Download” button from the tool bar on the right side of the Prezi.
Select the “Download for Prezi Desktop” option and click the “Download” button.
Click the “click this link to download” link to download your Prezi as a “.pez” file.
Click the “File” menu followed by “Open” from the context menu in Prezi Desktop.
Select the downloaded “.pez” file and double-click it to open it.
You can now edit and present your Prezi presentation offline using the Prezi Desktop software.
